SEARCH
Package Server.Downloader

Class DownloaderWorker

java.lang.Object
Server.Downloader.DownloaderWorker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class DownloaderWorker extends Object implements Runnable
The DownloaderWorker class represents a worker that visits URLs and performs crawling tasks.

  • Constructor Details

    • DownloaderWorker

      public DownloaderWorker(int id, String queueIP, String interfaceAddress, String mcastGroupAddress, int multicastPort, int minWaitTime, int maxWaitTime)
      Constructs a DownloaderWorker object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the worker
      queueIP - the IP address of the Server.URLQueue
      interfaceAddress - the interface address for reliable multicast
      mcastGroupAddress - the multicast group address for reliable multicast
      multicastPort - the multicast port for reliable multicast
      minWaitTime - the minimum wait time for the downloader
      maxWaitTime - the maximum wait time for the downloader
